main event: A witness reported seeing a round, flat object that appeared silver against the sky background and black against cloud background over Manitou Springs, Colorado.
interesting points: The object was described as round but flat, like an oyster or a silver dollar.
The object was visible for about 15 seconds, moving in a straight line from east to west behind the mountains.
Two witnesses reported the sighting - a housewife and her 13-year-old sister.
The report mentions rodeo season with many gas-filled toy balloons being sold and observed in the area.
The investigating officer concluded the object was likely a gas-filled toy balloon based on a follow-up call from a lifeguard who spotted similar drifting objects and identified them as toy balloons.
sighted object: round, flat object like a silver dollar
